current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide for the release of the reversionary interest
		  held by the United States in certain land conveyed in 1954 by the United
		  States, acting through the Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to the
		  State of Oregon for the establishment of the Hermiston Agricultural Research
		  and Extension Center of Oregon State University in Hermiston,
		  Oregon.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Energy and Natural
			 Resources

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Hermiston Agricultural Research and
			 Extension Center Land Conveyance Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

and dated July 23, 2013,

Hermiston
			 Agricultural Research and Extension Center

(acting on behalf of the United States) to the State,

means the State of Oregon (acting through the Oregon

header.#text:
Release of
			 reversionary interest and reservation of mineral rights to Bureau of Land
			 Management land conveyed to the State of Oregon for the establishment of

Release of

text.#text:
the reversionary interest retained by the
			 United States to the research center land under the patent; and

the reservation of mineral rights by the
			 United States to the research center land under the patent.

is subject to the condition that the State agrees to

for agricultural experimental and research work of Oregon State
